bioconda.name: bioconductor-spia
bioconda.summary: Signaling Pathway Impact Analysis (SPIA) using combined evidence of pathway over-representation and unusual signaling perturbations

biotools.summary: This package implements the Signaling Pathway Impact Analysis which uses the information form a list of differentially expressed genes and their log fold changes together with signaling pathways topology, in order to identify the pathways most relevant to the condition under the study.

bioschemas.name: SPIA
bioschemas.summary: This package implements the Signaling Pathway Impact Analysis which uses the information form a list of differentially expressed genes and their log fold changes together with signaling pathways topology, in order to identify the pathways most relevant to the condition under the study.
